detectors.description:
YFVRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#871-887) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#873)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#876)
detectors.markdown:
[YFVRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#L871-L887) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#L873)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#L876)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(rewardRate == 0,vETH could be claimed only after the pool ends.)

detectors.description:
YFVRewards.claimVETHReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#767-774) uses a dangerous strict equality:

[YFVRewards.claimVETHReward()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#L767-L774) uses a dangerous strict equality:

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in YFVRewards.checkNextEpoch() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#840-864):
	External calls:
	- yfv.mint(address(this),currentEpochReward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#852)
	- vUSD.mint(address(this),currentEpochReward.div(vUSD_REWARD_FRACTION_RATE)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#853)
	- vETH.mint(address(this),currentEpochReward.div(vETH_REWARD_FRACTION_RATE)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#854)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- periodFinish = block.timestamp.add(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#860)
	- totalAccumulatedReward = totalAccumulatedReward.add(currentEpochReward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards.sol#855)
